title: Question:
author: JollyGood
created_time: January 05, 2023, 10:38:30 PMLast edit: March 01, 2025, 03:14:01 PM by JollyGood
content: self-moderated to keep this thread clean from trolls, attention-seekers and signature spammers- check for results and fixtures- to chat about their teams- to chat about the players- as well as general chat about the FA Cup===================================================LOCAL RULEALL MEMBERS PLEASE NOTE:I want to try to keep this thread clean and legible.If you make posts that are quoting more than 2 members in a single direct reply, it will probably be deleted therefore if your main priority is to post to earn signature campaign fees it will affect your quota if your post gets deleted.Feel free to individually quote and individually reply to each quote to as many members as you want within your post, as that is acceptable.Please keep this local rule in mind when posting here. Thank you.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.created_time: January 06, 2023, 07:42:43 AMLast edit: January 06, 2023, 08:57:52 PM by JollyGood
comments.body: This is the only FA Cup game taking place today and it is the first involving Premier League clubs:Manchester United vs Everton If Everton lose there is a possibility Lampard will be sacked after the game. Surely with such a dismal record as manager he should be replaced because Everton are not a small club, they have a huge potential.

comments.author: Juggy777
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on January 05, 2023, 10:38:30 PMIt is now the 3rd round of the competition which mean the first games featuring the Premier League clubs has started. Here is the only FA Cup game taking place tomorrow:If Everton lose there is a possibility Lampard will be sacked after the game. Surely with such a dismal record as manager he should be replaced because Everton are not a small club, they have a huge potential.@JollyGood I personally expect Manchester United to win because I’m sure that Erik ten Hag  desires to win a trophy in his first season, and the way he prepares his team for every match makes me confident to say that my beloved club is back on track. Furthermore Lampard needs to go and I can’t understand how has he survived so far?, and lastly do you feel that Chelsea will be able to get revenge on City for yesterday’s loss or do you feel that they’ll be defeated by City again?.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Juggy777 on January 06, 2023, 10:21:39 AM@JollyGood I personally expect Manchester United to win because I’m sure that Erik ten Hag  desires to win a trophy in his first season, and the way he prepares his team for every match makes me confident to say that my beloved club is back on track. FA cup is not easy and to know the club that will be the FA cup winner is very difficult, there are many other clubs that are good in EPL that are eager to win FA cup too, Manchester United team can try their best, but they may or may not be the winner. But as for today's match, this season has been a bad season for Everton and they are on the relegation position in premier league, that is enough to let us know that Manchester United is having a better chance to win.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.created_time: January 06, 2023, 08:21:36 PMLast edit: January 06, 2023, 08:58:19 PM by JollyGood
comments.body: The game is at first half and the score is 1-1.Quote from: Juggy777 on January 06, 2023, 10:21:39 AM@JollyGood I personally expect Manchester United to win because I’m sure that Erik ten Hag  desires to win a trophy in his first season, and the way he prepares his team for every match makes me confident to say that my beloved club is back on track. Furthermore Lampard needs to go and I can’t understand how has he survived so far?, and lastly do you feel that Chelsea will be able to get revenge on City for yesterday’s loss or do you feel that they’ll be defeated by City again?.I also expect Manchester United to win the game. As for Lampard, I have no idea how he has survived so long with a dismal record at Everton. I expect Manchester City to win their FA Cup game against Chelsea because Potter and his team have not been good enough most of the season.Quote from: _act_ on January 06, 2023, 11:51:38 AMFA cup is not easy and to know the club that will be the FA cup winner is very difficult, there are many other clubs that are good in EPL that are eager to win FA cup too, Manchester United team can try their best, but they may or may not be the winner. But as for today's match, this season has been a bad season for Everton and they are on the relegation position in premier league, that is enough to let us know that Manchester United is having a better chance to win.Simply put yes Manchester United should win the game.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on January 06, 2023, 08:21:36 PMSimply put yes Manchester United should win the game.The game finally ended 3-1 in favour of Manchester United and Marcus Rashford scores again in another Manchester United game. This team that Erik Ten Hag has put together is definitely one to be feared and even more in attack with rumours of Felix and Aboubakar from Cameron likely to join them on loan.I wonder why they don't use VAR in FA cup games, VAR technology should be used in all competitions since it has improved decision making process although some decisions with it are still biased, but majorly I feel VAR should be used generally. Some decisions from the officials in the game was not completely accepted as correct and should have warranted a VAR check for verification.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Manchester United 3 - 1 Evertonwell, i have seen several negative comments about the everton coach frack lampard, apart from him he is responsible for the most results, because even in certain games he could have made some changes in the team strategy he could have achieved better results, but everton already had other coaches with a good reputation who were unable to bring good results to everton, from what i see this situation of bad results for everton may have deeper origins within the management of the club itselfin almost 7 years the owner of everton fired 5 coaches, these are scary numbers, it is not possible that the 5 coaches are wrong and are missing, the problem may not be with the coaches. something else is failing. Lampard's csso I don't know if I will fire him, but if he leaves and takes on another coach, I very much doubt that much will change, probably the thing that would change would be the team not being close to the relegation zone

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These are the results of the FA Cup games played today:Crystal Palace 1-2 SouthamptonGillingham 0-1 Leicester CityPreston North End 3-1 Huddersfield TownReading 2-0 WatfordTottenham Hotspur 1-0 PortsmouthBlackpool 4-1 Nottingham ForestBoreham Wood 1-1 Accrington StanleyBournemouth 2-4 BurnleyChesterfield 3-3 West Bromwich AlbionFleetwood Town 2-1 Queens Park RangersHull City 0-2 FulhamIpswich Town 4-1 Rotherham UnitedMiddlesbrough 1-5 Brighton and Hove AlbionMillwall 0-2 Sheffield UnitedShrewsbury Town 1-2 SunderlandBrentford 0-1 West Ham UnitedCoventry City 3-4 WrexhamGrimsby Town 1-0 Burton AlbionLuton Town 1-1 Wigan AthleticLiverpool 2-2 Wolverhampton Wanderers   There was one game called-off which will be re-scheduled: Forest Green Rovers vs Birmingham City (postponed because of waterlogged pitch)

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Liverpool 2-2 Wolverhampton Wanderers Honestly this game was a shocker. I really should commend the efforts of the Wolves side. Being the goal openers, I expected them to become weak during the second half since most of their games end that way, but after Salah's goal in the 52nd minute, I felt that was the end.  This game only proves that Jurgen Klopp is really struggling  to get to the top four standings and although it doesn't affect their position, it would have been worth it to perform better. Hopefully they'd do better in the next leg.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: The way Wolves were playing they deserved to get at least a draw from the game and maybe could have edged it to deserve a win. Though neither team wanted a replay that is what will happen because unlike last season the games will revert to replays and then extra-time and penalties if necessary. I preferred the previous format last season where domestic cup games were decided on the day rather than replays because it adds to an already congested fixture list.Liverpool will have to travel to Wolverhampton (for the replay) and then winner will move in to the 4th round of the tournament.Quote from: Majestic-milf on January 07, 2023, 10:59:17 PM Liverpool 2-2 Wolverhampton Wanderers Honestly this game was a shocker. I really should commend the efforts of the Wolves side. Being the goal openers, I expected them to become weak during the second half since most of their games end that way, but after Salah's goal in the 52nd minute, I felt that was the end.  This game only proves that Jurgen Klopp is really struggling  to get to the top four standings and although it doesn't affect their position, it would have been worth it to perform better. Hopefully they'd do better in the next leg.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on January 05, 2023, 10:38:30 PMManchester City 16:30 ChelseaAnother big test for Chelsea after loosing already to Manchester City in the Premier League. Hopefully they have been able to make changes and known their errors in the first game that made them loose three points to be able to win Manchester City in this FA cup clash. The winner in this game will be the team to play the winners in the game between Oxford and Arsenal tomorrow. Chelsea in this game don't need to play the defensive, that did not work for them before, they need to put pressure on Manchester City and take any chance they get in this game to avoid loosing a second time to Manchester City.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These are the results from the FA Cup games played today:Bristol City 1-1 Swansea CityDerby County 3-0 Barnsley Cardiff City 2-2 Leeds United Hartlepool United 0-3 Stoke City Norwich City 0-1 Blackburn Rovers Stockport County 1-2 Walsall Aston Villa 1-2 StevenageManchester City 4-0 Chelsea The result of the day has to be Stevenage beating Aston Villa after coming from a goal down scoring two goals in the final two minutes of the game. The League Two club have caused a major shock but this is the magic of the FA Cup, smaller clubs can occasionally beat the much bigger clubs.Quote from: Rruchi man on January 08, 2023, 04:41:22 PMAnother big test for Chelsea after loosing already to Manchester City in the Premier League. Well, Chelsea are in big trouble when it comes to the Premier League. There is no real chance of them finishing in the top four this season therefore they will not play Champions League next season. On merit alone, Manchester City,  Arsenal, Newcastle United and Manchester United deserve to finish in the top four but as the season goes on that could change. As for their game today, Manchester City absolutely took them apart and exposed their weaknesses with a convincing 4-0 win. Even though Manchester City put out  a weakened team, Chelsea tried to field a team as strong as possible because they have to try to win any domestic cup they can. Chelsea are out of the competition and they continue to have a miserable season. Potter is the wrong man to be their manager or coach.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Here is the only FA Cup game taking place this evening:Oxford United 0-3 ArsenalThe next set of FA Cup games (including replays) will take place on 17th January 2023:Accrington Stanley vs Boreham WoodForest Green Rovers vs Birmingham CityLeeds United vs Cardiff CitySwansea City vs Bristol CityWigan Athletic vs Luton TownWolverhampton Wanderers vs LiverpoolWest Bromwich Albion vs Chesterfield

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These 3rd round replays will take place this evening:Accrington Stanley vs Boreham WoodForest Green Rovers vs Birmingham CityLeeds United vs Cardiff CitySwansea City vs Bristol CityWigan Athletic vs Luton TownWolverhampton Wanderers vs LiverpoolWest Bromwich Albion vs Chesterfield How many of you think Wolves will beat Liverpool? I think it will be tough for them, I expect Wolves to win especially after Liverpool were beaten comprehensively in the Premier League by Brighton over the weekend. As for the 4th round draw, I will post it in full after all the games have been played so we know who will play who

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: The only FA Cup game taking place this evening:  Manchester City vs ArsenalAt the time of writing the post, Manchester City are winning 1-0 with a goal from Ake after 64 minutes. This is the first game in the 4th round of the competition. The following 4th round games take place over the weekend.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on January 27, 2023, 09:38:31 PMThe only FA Cup game taking place this evening:  Manchester City vs ArsenalAt the time of writing the post, Manchester City are winning 1-0 with a goal from Ake after 64 minutes. This is the first game in the 4th round of the competition. The following 4th round games take place over the weekend.Although Manchester city won at the end of the day, they did not quite impress and dominate the game like they usually do. It was a fairly balanced game that I feel that Arsenal could have won had Arteta started with our regular first Eleven players and not removing Thomas Party for Sambi Lokonga, and starting Odegaard. The moment Thomas Partey went off, I feel Manchester United got an edge in midfield. Arsenal was able to contain De Bruyne and Halaand, and that is something good in preparation for when we play Manchester city in the premier league. Congratulations Manchester city, the can win the FA cup this season, since Arsenal are looking fully focused on winning the EPL.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: I am certain Arsenal will not win the Premier League and the game today shows Arsenal can be beaten by a more determined opponent. Manchester City will not let go of their champions status easily. Manchester City deserved their win and they proceed to the 5th Round,Here are the 4th Round games taking place tomorrow Saturday 28th January 2023:Accrington Stanley vs Leeds United         Walsall vs Leicester City         Blackburn Rovers vs Birmingham City         Bristol City vs West Bromwich Albion         Fulham vs Sunderland         Ipswich Town vs Burnley         Luton Town vs Grimsby Town         Sheffield Wednesday vs Fleetwood Town         Southampton vs Blackpool         Preston North End vs Tottenham Hotspur         Manchester United vs ReadingQuote from: Rruchi man on January 27, 2023, 10:15:53 PMAlthough Manchester city won at the end of the day, they did not quite impress and dominate the game like they usually do. It was a fairly balanced game that I feel that Arsenal could have won had Arteta started with our regular first Eleven players and not removing Thomas Party for Sambi Lokonga, and starting Odegaard. The moment Thomas Partey went off, I feel Manchester United got an edge in midfield. Arsenal was able to contain De Bruyne and Halaand, and that is something good in preparation for when we play Manchester city in the premier league. Congratulations Manchester city, the can win the FA cup this season, since Arsenal are looking fully focused on winning the EPL.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These are all the FA Cup 4th results for games already played including today:Sunday 29th January 2023Brighton and Hove Albion 2-1 Liverpool  Stoke City 3-1 Stevenage Wrexham 3-3 Sheffield United  Saturday 28th January 2023Accrington Stanley 1-3 Leeds United Walsall 0-1 Leicester City Blackburn Rovers 2-2 Birmingham City  Bristol City 3-0 West Bromwich Albion  Fulham 1-1 Sunderland  Ipswich Town 0-0 Burnley  Luton Town 2-2 Grimsby Town  Sheffield Wednesday 1-1 Fleetwood Town Southampton 2-1 Blackpool  Preston North End 0-3 Tottenham Hotspur  Manchester United 3-1 Reading  Friday 27th January 2023Manchester City 1-0 Arsenal After outstanding games have been played and the 5th Round draw has been made, I will update the thread.

comments.author: Juggy777
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on January 29, 2023, 10:47:22 PMThese are all the FA Cup 4th results for games already played including today:Sunday 29th January 2023Brighton and Hove Albion 2-1 Liverpool  Stoke City 3-1 Stevenage Wrexham 3-3 Sheffield United  Saturday 28th January 2023Accrington Stanley 1-3 Leeds United Walsall 0-1 Leicester City Blackburn Rovers 2-2 Birmingham City  Bristol City 3-0 West Bromwich Albion  Fulham 1-1 Sunderland  Ipswich Town 0-0 Burnley  Luton Town 2-2 Grimsby Town  Sheffield Wednesday 1-1 Fleetwood Town Southampton 2-1 Blackpool  Preston North End 0-3 Tottenham Hotspur  Manchester United 3-1 Reading  Friday 27th January 2023Manchester City 1-0 Arsenal After outstanding games have been played and the 5th Round draw has been made, I will update the thread.@JollyGood I’m really happy for Manchester United, and the way they’re playing is making every Red Devil fan’s proud and it’s hard to imagine that we were getting  Rabiot instead of Casemiro . Furthermore  Liverpool season seems to be jinxed, because they have been eliminated from this competition and now I wonder how long before the Liverpool board loses patience with Klopp and sacks him?.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.created_time: January 30, 2023, 11:09:39 AMLast edit: January 30, 2023, 07:29:08 PM by JollyGood
comments.body: I thought they overpaid for Casemiro because he was already 30 years of age when he joined Manchester United but he has been a very good player for them.Liverpool were beaten by Brighton. Opponents just do not fear facing Liverpool, they have dipped in form after selling Sadio Mane. It just goes to show how important Mane was for the team (more than Salah). If Liverpool owners sack Klopp they will have to pay compensation and then give the new manager time to rebuild and spend on players he wants to bring in. As long as Klopp does not resign the board will not sack him because the club is now for sale they would prefer to sell it and let the new owners make decisions.Quote from: Juggy777 on January 30, 2023, 03:40:09 AM@JollyGood I’m really happy for Manchester United, and the way they’re playing is making every Red Devil fan’s proud and it’s hard to imagine that we were getting  Rabiot instead of Casemiro . Furthermore  Liverpool season seems to be jinxed, because they have been eliminated from this competition and now I wonder how long before the Liverpool board loses patience with Klopp and sacks him?.
